name: Rosie Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sheer..Key Notes: Rose, Nude Musk, Vanilla..Fragrance Description: ROSIE is all white musk. It’s the top, middle and base note but we added just a hint of pure ROSE oil to ground and open up the senses. This fragrance will mold itself to you- making it unique to ONLY you. Rosie leaves skin smelling of clean and calm...About the Fragrance: Inspired by naked skin with notes of nude musk and sweet rose..FEELS LIKE: Sleeping in your birthday suit. Nude + translucent..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Organic Cane Sugar Alcohol And Distilled Water, Ambrettolide, Ambroxan, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylene Brassylate......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent....We work hard, so you don’t have too!  ALL by Rosie Jane packaging is recyclable..How to be a cool human:.- Remove pump and sprayer from our bottles, rinse and throw into your home recycle bin..- Our boxes too!!.- You can return the sprayer and pumps back to By Rosie Jane and we will recycle them for you and also give you a little gift in return....Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?:.The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_title: Soft, Sophisticated, and Worth the Hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this perfume as one of my November Ipsy choices, and let me tell you, I was not expecting to love it as much as I do! It’s such a gorgeous scent—delicate, clean, and super feminine. It’s one of those fragrances that makes you feel like you just stepped out of a spa, fresh and put-together. What’s interesting is that it’s a parfum, but the texture feels a little thicker, almost like a parfum oil. I actually have to rub it in when I apply it, which I didn’t mind at all. It kind of makes it feel more luxe and special to me. LOL Honestly, I’m obsessed, and I can already tell this is going to be one of those things I will buy again. It’s just that good. If you’re ever looking for something soft and classy that still feels unique, this is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent! Bought blind buy and I'm so glad I tried it. It's soft, feminine, and clean. It the type of scent that stays pretty close to the body but if you're near people they comment how lovely you smell. It's an easy wear as it's not overpowering or offensive at all. A perfect office scent, but also great for a date. I just love it. This may become my new signature scent!

reviews.review_title: Please Make a More Intense Version!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was love at first sniff for me! I've been searching ages for something that smells nude and comforting with the tiniest drop of dewy sweetness. I finally found it and I'm so happy! But I BEG you to please come out with a 'Rosie Intense' or 'Rosier' version with this exact same scent just . . . more of it.  It's too beautiful of a smell to be this ghostly. It doesn't linger long enough, either. I don't like loud or cloying scents, but if Rosie were kicked up a notch it would be such a perfect fragrance.   As for what season this would work best in, I'd say it's tricky because to me if smells like if you laid a single fresh rose petal covered in iridescent dew drops over a pristine snowfall. I think this one is so inoffensive and subtle that it'll be a standout in any season!

reviews.review_title: New formula removed rose and vanilla notes
reviews.review_text: The old formulation was intoxicating— a sweet blend of roses, white musk, and vanilla. It was a warm and delicate skin scent that still had decent lasting power. They stopped producing that version some time in 2020-2021 in order to make the perfume “more natural.”  This new version most notably removed the Rosa damascena oil from its ingredients (among several other changes) and is an oily, slightly sweet musk that doesn’t hold a candle to the original. The sweetness combined with the musk, without floral and vanilla notes for balance, just makes it smell sickly after a while. My friend still wears it but we both wish to see the previous version come back.

reviews.review_title: Great clean skin scent but low staying power!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a great clean skin/ sweet musk scent with just a couple of cons. I tested Rosie in-store and would not stop sniffing my paper test strip throughout the day - bought the full-sized bottle the next day. When I sprayed my new bottle, it smelled strangely like metal. When I sprayed it on me and smelled it throughout the day, it smelled nothing like when I tested it. I let the bottle sit/ macerate for a couple of days and now it is starting to smell as it did in-store. The in-store tester bottles sit out for much longer and are sprayed more often compared to the new bottle. The last con is the low staying power, although I enjoy the scent so I will be keeping my bottle.

None of them compare to this one. I can't stop smelling it. I layer it with the Rosie perfume oil. It's not super strong and I don't smell it after about 3 hours but I just reapply. Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

Such a natural smell…it smells like a bed of roses. Amazing amazing perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On a quest to find clean, non-toxic products. I saw this recommended on Tik Tok. Happy to report I love the scent. I think it's a perfect everyday scent. A lot of perfumes bother my sinuses or give me a headache. This does not! Happy with my purchase :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I find this scent to be so comforting yet sensual. Fragrance is an 11/10, it is absolutely beautiful and unique. HOWEVER, this doesn’t seem to last or smell as good as the perfume oil and that is because this perfume opens with a very strong alcohol scent. I still adore and highly recommend the fragrance, I just might recommend the oil version more.

reviews.review_title: Fresh as could be ! Absolutely love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like your Fresh out of the shower ! Super clean smelling . Light but potent. Highly recommend. I received a sample of it in one of my orders and now I’m hooked !

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent it’s clean and skin-like. I just wish it projected more and lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is Pleasant and soft, it’s a good every day perfume

reviews.review_title: BEST way to experience and enjoy the Rosie scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST way to experience and enjoy the Rosie scent. Here’s why: The body wash isn’t anything special but it is nice to have something without such a strong scent. But.. with that said you can barely smell the Rosie scent which seems to be a theme of this brand. Don’t get me wrong Rosie is my favorite scent so I’ve bought a lot of the Rosie scented products from byrosiejane on Sephora and their actual site including the perfume oil, body oil, candle, body wash, travel, and full size. Unfortunately, most don’t give off the Rosie scent very well or as well as the Perfume does. For the body wash there seems to be an inconsistency with the texture/ look. The 1st one I received had a see-through yellow tint which showed the dispense tube and now the rest resemble a yellow foggy milk leaving the tube unseen. Maybe they’ve changed the formula, as now site photos seemed to have changed a little as well, idk. The Body oil does indeed smell like cooking oil like others have mentioned especially while applying. I am only able to smell the Rosie scent from the body oil once it has dried into my skin and still it is ever so slight. It does make my skin soft but a little doesn’t necessarily go a long way. For the candle well lets be honest here; It smells nice but does not smell like the intended Rosie scent. Smells more like a very soft cotton linen with a hint of coconut since that is the “wax” used. As for the perfume oil well the Spray is better for me as in the perfume oil I can distinctively smell the oil used along with the Rosie scent though doesn’t give any hint of coconut like the candle somewhat does. But if you do find yourself wanting the other products I suggest adding the Perfume spray to your cart in tandem to get the best out of the Rosie fragrance routine. The Rosie fragrance really is a clean, just washed, calm, and girly yet no frills scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such and clean and beautiful skin fragrance, it was a blind by and so worth it. It stays close to the skin, a perfect musky floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell but the perfume leaked in my toiletry bag on my way home from a trip. That was super disappointing. I don’t mind paying more for certain quality but packaging needs correcting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful scent I have the perfume oil and it is so addictive I had to get the EDT it smells like a very luxurious delicate french shower gel rose scent that is very clean but feminine. Reminds me of fancy stores in parisParis.

reviews.review_title: This newer, clean formula is really short-lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was briefly my favorite scent. I got through 2 travel sprays that were great, then they I believe came out with a new formula that fit the clean parameters.  This new clean formula is much weaker & lasts just long enough to spell R-E-T-U-R-N & it's evaporated & the smell is pretty much gone. I tried 2 new bottles & both have been like this.  DEAR ROSIE JANE, PLEASE BRING BACK THE ORIGINAL ROSIE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this so bad. It wasn't the cologne itself but the packaging. Didn't pay attention to it till I  went on vacation and unpacked my purse to notice half of the perfume had leaked in my purse. The sprayer came off completely. Everything in my purse was ruined. I was not happy about that since I  just got this in the mail a week prior. The company needs to do a better job of getting a different package or sprayer because it is not secured on tightly and comes off easily. Will not purchase this again in the travel size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really just the best scent I’ve found! So light and beautiful, buildable but great alone too! I’m totally stocked up now, 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful skin scent, it’s very light, fresh and somehow warm in a welcoming way. Love this at night, could never get tired of this scent

reviews.review_title: Beautiful clean skin scent with lasting power

reviews.review_text: Light, clean, sweet, and floral.  It is more of a skin scent which I love but it also does last a good amount of time for a clean fragrance.  My new favorite perfume hands-down. Gorgeous!

reviews.review_title: A gorgeous light scent for everyday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Rosie is my favorite of the by/Rosie Jane scents! It’s a light layerable scent that’s clean and floral. I like to layer it with the oil to make it more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful, I wish I had tried this fragrance sooner. It's for days when you want a subtle scent that isn't overpowering. Has good staying power and lasts throughout the day. Just what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don’t reach for perfumes with these notes but I received this perfume as a sample and was blown away. Absolutely stunning fragrance. Light, clean, no offensive, and great for everyday wear

reviews.review_title: No, don't buy this no matter how good the sample!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample just like all the other reviews and thought, I just had to have the perfume! Then when it came, it was no where near as strong as the small little sample, so I thought I was applying it wrong. Until I read all the other reviews. I don't smoke, and I don't use any other perfumes so there isn't a reason this EXPENSIVE perfume should be lasting 30 seconds. I'm truly disappointed because the smell is wonderful, but it's so watered down you can't smell it. So, go ahead and buy it, if you want to use it 10 times in a day and the travel size only last you maybe 2 weeks.

reviews.review_title: It's a no. Go with the oil instead!

The spray doesn't last very long and doesn't even smell as good as the oil. The spray smells much more like a chemical while the oil smells AMAZING. The oil also lasts me practically all day. If you like this smell, please get the oil instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the sample perfume oil and absolutely love the scent- it smells exactly as it’s listed. I gave this a 4 star rating because the spray doesn’t last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is SO good. It smells as though I just took a long hot shower, dried off with a towel that has been put away in a cedar chest for a few months, and then climbed naked into a bed made up with freshly washed and line dried sheets.and took a nap with the sun warming my skin. This scent is an instant favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

It’s perfect to wear to work it’s not over powering at all. I pair the oil with the perfume and the scent lingers all day! Highly Recommend! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this fragrance! Smells so clean and fresh. I use it with the oil and it lasts a lot longer than by itself. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite of all the subtle skin scents that I've tried. I've tried JHAG Not a Perfume, Glossier You, Clean Skin, and a few more from other brands. To me, they were all either missing something or skewed a little too musky, or peppery, or sweet, or something else. In my opinion this one is the most balanced and wearable. It is soft, slightly floral and slightly sweet (but not at all cloying) and lightly musky and airy. My young daughter gave me a hug and just inhaled. I asked if she liked it and she sighed and said it smells wonderful, like you mommy and then proceeded to inhale some more. That's the best I can describe it - it smells like skin but better. This is NOT a statement perfume, people will not notice it when you walk into a room, if that's what you are looking for then this is not for you. It's good for an office or close quarters where you don't want to announce your scent to other people but you would still like a little something extra.  I started off with the travel size of this perfume to test it out but I will be purchasing the larger size when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample with my order, and I immediately got online and purchased the perfume and the perfume oil! This is an everyday scent perfect for spring!! 🥰💐🍬🎀

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin

Fortunately it smells good on me too :) I loved that I would get whiffs of myself through out the day. I am in heaven! My sisters are off buying the scent too, they loved it so much. It's subtle, clean, and so wonderful smelling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Best clean product for sensitive skin!!

This scent is my favorite along with Madie, but the best part is that I have no skin reaction after I apply it to my skin, the smell is fantastic. If you want to have a great extension of this scent please add the body oil or shower gel, you won’t regret it.🥹 I LOVE THIS PRODUCT FOR REAL! Best money spend.

reviews.review_title: LOVE THIS SCENT!!! Will always be a go to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

One of my most favorite perfumes!! Always get compliments when I wear it!
This is the #1 scent that literal strangers ask me about in public. It’s sexy, sweet, and lingers! My fave of all time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance so much! It’s one of my signature smells and I’ve gotten a ton of compliments on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume: it's my go to for everyday use. It has such a refreshing scent and never disappoints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Repurchased twice! AHmazing scent, subtle but captivating. You smell great but it's not obvious that you're wearing a fragrance and that's what I like about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rosie is the most lovely fragrance I have ever worn and it wasn’t purchased in a department store or a celebrity name on it. The simplicity of the name, bottle and company values are so appreciated. I have a coworker named Rosie and she is interested in the fragrance! I love spraying on the fragrance every morning and how it makes me feel fresh, pretty and happy! Thanks for creating a fragrance masterpiece!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this perfume!! I've been using it for over a year and I'm still not sick of it. I always get asked what perfume I'm wearing it. I've tried a bunch of their scents and they're all great but this one is my favorite!
Love this scent! My go to fragrance. So classic and not overwhelming. Very natural and woodsy. Smells like the inside of a rosewood jewelry box, would def recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fresh and clean scent. Perfect for daily wear. It doesn't last long but I layer this with Dylan to create more intense & longer lasting  scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the only fragrance I wear and probably the only one I will ever wear!  literally receive compliments everyday on how I smell thanks to this and the same scent in the body oil. even from complete strangers! cannot recommend enough, plus the packaging is beautiful and the company aligns with my values as a low waste vegan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You really can’t go wrong with a By Rosie Jane fragrance. They all have a a really clean, fresh base that’s never cloying or overbearing. I have scent sensitivities but don’t have any troubles with BRJ. I also don’t like floral perfumes but I actually love the Rosie scent from BRJ because it’s so light, clean, and feminine. It’s described perfectly by the company- an undeniably musky rose.  *I received a free product for submitting this review about a product that I already owned (purchased myself) and loved. My opinion here is 100% honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used by/rosie for a couple years, and I'm still thrilled with the Rosie scent. It's light, fresh, and clean. The rose is subtle and not too sweet. I also have the James scent, which is warmer, a touch sweeter, and to me, a just a hint muskier. I go with Rosie is for year round use, and I lean to James in colder months. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: a friendship formed due to this scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first smelled this scent on a new coworker. I always knew when she had stepped in the room, or where she had perhaps just been. I loved it. It was so signature, and so distinct without being overbearing. I just wanted to be like her, I wanted people to know me by a scent too. I purchased it for myself. Now even though some know me by this smell, it will always be that girl’s. I ended up becoming best friends with that girl, for non-perfume related reasons. This smell, so warm, barely-there floral, delightfully inviting, brings back the earliest memories of my friendship with her, when she was just the new girl who smelled like Rosie. By Rosie Jane has really captured my heart with this scent and that means the world to me. I’ll forever be a consumer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fresh smell of this earth conscious perfume. It is my daughter’s favorite signature scent and I feel safe letting her use it knowing Rosie Jane cares about clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST PERFUME EVERRRR! my favorite scent i have come across. always get compliments when i use this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love. This is my go to perfume when I’m not necessarily sure what to wear. I have over 80 perfumes and this is one of my most used in my collection. Definitely a your skin but better scent. 1000% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite perfume brand and this scent is incredible, I always get compliments when I wear it. I love to layer the scents with their body oil and or/perfume oil to make it last nicely all day! It's hard to find complex yet clean perfume brands but this brand nailed it.  I love to gift the travel sets for gifts too!

Rosie is the perfect scent for me!! It’s subtle and fresh. Note this is extremely important for someone like me , strong perfumes can cause a migraine. The packaging is simple and clean. I have the candle, body wash, body oil, perfume oil, and spray. While I love this scent the body oil is my least favorite - the scent is slightly off. Perhaps just my body chemistry isn’t keen with the body oil. The perfume oil would make a better substitution to the body oil. This is an everyday staple & this scent is my absolute favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent. Fresh and clean, not too floral. I use the body wash, oil, and perfume to make it last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rosie by Rosie Jane is the freshest, cleanest non-perfumey perfume I have encountered. I smelled the home fragrance at a friend's house and immediately tracked it down. I have been wearing it ever since! It has staying power without being overwhelming. So many people have asked me what it is. Believe the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a divine skin scent! It sits close to the skin, but is so sweet and personal. An easy blind buy for almost anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is described perfectly, I always feel like I just showered! Fresh and clean, the rose comes through clearly but is not overpowering or too floral. There is a great balance of rose and musk. I love!!!
I fell in love with this scent. Wear it everyday and recommend it to people who look for an everyday perfume. Get so many compliments on it at work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You MUST have this! I have 3 or 4 different fragrances I wear on rotation and THIS ONE…this is the one I get consistent compliments on. Women and men ask me…strangers, friends…if they smell me they are asking me, “What is it, where can I buy it.” A cool thing about it is you’ll stop smelling it and forget you have it on and then BAM, someone will ask about it, reminding you it’s still there. And the price…are you kidding? This is a LOW price not only compared to other high end perfumes, but also just compared to how much use you will get out of it. Go ahead and buy at least TWO bottles cause once you have it, you will not wanna wait for another one to come in when you run out. I’ve repurchased this online and at Sephora and various places at least 4 times. I originally got a sample from a beauty box and have loved it ever since. I also highly recommend the oil to compliment the spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So happy I found By Rosie Jane! I have tried most of their fragrances and Rosie is my favorite. It’s not overly floral - just fresh and clean. I get so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always on the hunt for perfume that smells nice, lasts the whole day, and is clean. It is almost impossible to satisfy all of these factors, but Rosie Perfume FITS THE BILL! I love lake, Dylan, and Rosie. Thanks for a fabulous product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! Rosie Jane is my favorite travel spray. I like the “Rosie” scent best of all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably one of my favorite perfume oils. Smells so pretty, this is perfect if you’re looking for a scent that isn’t too heavy. The rose in this is very light and great for daytime.
Love this everyday perfume! It smells sweet, light, and natural. This has to be my favorite perfume of all time! The fact that is made with clean and natural ingredients is a bonus!!!

been using this perfume for the past several months. subtle yet good longevity. my favorite “your skin but better” type of perfume and great for those who are sensitive to strong scents! I’m not usually a fan of rose perfumes but here the subtle rose note compliments the musk so beautifully. highly recommend!

I have had people tell me that they can't really smell it, so if you like stronger scents it might not be for you. reviews.review_title: Heads up: this is NOT the original Rosie
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Welp. This smells awful. If you loved the original Rosie, just know this doesn't smell like that. The OG Rosie was heavenly, it just smelled clean, like you just got out of the shower, with a touch of delicate rose. I loved that scent and went through bottle after bottle. I recently ordered a new bottle and to my dismay it smelled completely different, like many others have mentioned in the reviews. This just smells like dirty, musky water. I reached out to By Rosie Jane trying to figure out if this was a bad batch or just an actual change in formulation. I received an email response from their team confirming that indeed they changed the formula about a year ago to, in their words, make it cleaner and safer, and that this can also cause a shift in the scent. So there you have it. Our beloved Rosie is no more. I do not recommend this new version of the scent at all, it smells really awful. What a shame.
