reviews.review_text: I agree with some of the other reviewers—the scent is mild and needs to be applied in larger amounts initially, then it needs to be reapplied throughout the day. I haven’t had any issues with quality control though. I received a small vial of the oil as a sample and it smells nearly identical to the travel spray, though the spray is a bit “lighter” since it’s alcohol-based instead of oil-based. I’d buy this again, so hopefully the quality starts to become more consistent across batches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the smaller size of this perfume, but plan to get the full size next time. I've seen this perfumed described different ways; on me, it is a powdery rose and light musk scent, very feminine and soft. It is a very light perfume, so one would have to be standing very closely to get a whiff. I cannot stand perfumes with patchouli or citrus (great on others, but terrible on me), and so I gravitate towards the floral and the light musky/spicy fragrances. If you liked the way Amazing Grace used to smell, this one is similar, at least note-wise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite and go to! Every time I’ve worn this, I’ve received compliments (and wanting to know what) or heard ppl saying something smells nice. Very “natural” scent, a “to each their own” kind of scent. I will keep purchasing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the epitome of what “smells like you, but better” should be like. It’s light, clean, inoffensive, skin scent. Perfect for when you want to smell nice but don’t want the projection to knock people over. Great for someone with a sensitivity to perfume or allergies (headaches, sneezing). To my nose, I did become pretty nose blind to the scent pretty quickly but was able to catch small whiffs of it here and there and could smell it on my sweatshirt the next day. Will definitely keep this in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Forget the negative reviews! If you are a fan of the Glossier You scent and are trying to find variations, this is a really good scent to buy. I will note that there are a couple of differences. The musk is essentially the same and they smell really similar, but the powdery notes in this scent come from the rose. I've been on the hunt for a skin scent and this one comes closest to evoking feelings of warm solar. However, I would argue that the projection is not nearly as strong (I tried the solid and perfume version of You) but you will still get whiffs of it while wearing, even from the initial two spritz I put on my wrists. It's definitely good if you are someone who might get a headache from rose scents as it's not overpowering. I would buy while you still can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought one bottle last month for my purse and loved it. Bought another one (same thing) to keep in my nightstand and it is nothing like the first one. Way too much rose essence. I don’t like it at all. How does this happen??????? I am very disappointed and would like my money back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the scent does not last. The scent is similar to the oil so definitely a nice smell but it evaporates almost as soon as you spray it. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_title: smells like a stale sour coconut
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so bad, I keep sniffing to see if it’ll change and get better but it’s not. Definitely not worth any price. It was marketed as a clean scent, which it isn’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I, like many others, received a bottle with a product that smells nothing like Rosie. After going through two bottles of the travel size (because that’s all that was available at time of the purchases), I finally managed to snag a full sized bottle. Now the real Rosie is a 5-star scent. It just smells clean, fresh and floral, like you just got out of a shower. It’s the perfect minimalist scent for people who just love smelling delicately clean. However, the full sized bottle that I just received smells like musky water. It smells so bad it’s revolting. It’s not that it’s a different perfume that got mislabeled, it’s just quite literally a funky musky smelling water. By Rosie Jane clearly has some serious quality control issues going on. I’m leaving this review in hopes to help pressure them to get better. Buyer beware!

reviews.review_title: Not the same scent as the sample
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Same as the previous reviews, I had received a sample of this scent in my last Sephora order so I ordered the full size and unfortunately they smell nothing alike. Super unfortunate the sample size smelled amazing!
I have the same experience as other reviewers. I got a sample of this and loved it! I ordered the larger size and it smells nothing like it. I don’t smell any similarities whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had read online that there was a lot of inconsistency with this perfume but i decided to buy it anyway after i fell in love with the sample. The sample I’d received from the discovery set was a much more delicate, sweet rose. The full size i purchased was a huge disappointment in comparison. Its a watery musk with cheap rose reminiscent of hair spray. A real shame to, the sample was the most beautiful rose I’ve ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: I was very displeased when I ordered this product…I had got a sample of it and it smells nothing like the sample did…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Rosie oil as a sample and loved it instantly. It’s sold out so I figured this would do. It smells nothing like the oil. This one doesn’t smell natural or pretty at all. It literally smells like two completely different scents, which I don’t understand. If you’re hoping for something that smells like the Rosie oil do not go with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so in love with the smell of it. This parfume is absolutely what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: An enchanting light, romantic scent - I loved it instantly!! I hope the company ignores the negative comments and continues to make it just as it is.

reviews.review_title: Nothing like what it should be!
reviews.review_text: I read the many negative reviews for this fragrance all over the internet but still wanted to give it a try. Boy, should I have listened to the masses and you should too! This is nothing like what it’s meant to be or as described in the fragrance notes… just like everyone else says! Zero rose. Zero vanilla. Just pure, 100% watery musk. I tried this out in the concentrated fragrance oil and the scent was weak and barely there- so I can only imagine the bottled, liquid perfume would be EVEN worse! This is extremely reminiscent to Lake & Skye’s 11 11, but in a not as good version. 11 11 is much stronger in its projection/sillage and that fragrance oil lasts well into the next day! I recommend trying that scent if you’re after a nude musk (it has white amber notes as well) from a clean fragrance house! Rosie is such a disappointing scent. Again, there is no detectable rose or vanilla at all! Smells like a men’s cologne as well, since it’s just pure ozonic musk. There’s nothing feminine here. Will be returning!

reviews.review_title: Nothing like what it should be!
reviews.review_text: I read the many negative reviews for this fragrance all over the internet but still wanted to give it a try. Boy, should I have listened to the masses and you should too! This is nothing like what it’s meant to be or as described in the fragrance notes… just like everyone else says! Zero rose. Zero vanilla. Just pure, 100% watery musk. I tried this out in the concentrated fragrance oil and the scent was weak and barely there- so I can only imagine the bottled, liquid perfume would be EVEN worse! This is extremely reminiscent to Lake & Skye’s 11 11, but in a not as good version. 11 11 is much stronger in its projection/sillage and that fragrance oil lasts well into the next day! I recommend trying that scent if you’re after a nude musk (it has white amber notes as well) from a clean fragrance house! Rosie is such a disappointing scent. Again, there is no detectable rose or vanilla at all! Smells like a men’s cologne as well, since it’s just pure ozonic musk. There’s nothing feminine here. Will be returning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so bummed bc I loved this scent in the sample set and perfume oil (a lovely mix of rose, vanilla and musk) but this travel spray is straight roses.  Not sure if I got a bad batch but if this is how it’s supposed to be it’s disappointing how different it is from the other products that share the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing men's cologne for the last few years. I prefer unisex, fresh smells. I got bored of Georgio Armani's acqua and Rosie was a nice transition. I also layer it with Reserve Lush Fleur. Smells so good! wish it lasted longer through the day, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very dissapointed, i was thinking to return not satisfied with the smell it smells like a cheap cologne it didnt last long not worth your money..

reviews.review_title: Smells nothing like the oil version
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this to compliment the Rosie oil and they do not smell anything alike AT ALL. This just straight up smells like a bouquet of roses (if you’re into that, more power to you) while the Rosie oil is a really nice light scent that isn’t offensive (honestly the scent of my dreams). I definitely agree with the one review saying that this smells like a perfume from the dollar store. I’m really disappointed and if you get anything from the Rosie line, get the oil!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell! But the cap broke after the first week. It doesn’t close down and it leaks.

reviews.review_title: Smells Like Cheap Cologne From A Dime Store
reviews.review_text: The reviews for Rosie by Rosie Jane persuaded me to purchase the Travel Spray without trying a sample in the store.  What a mistake!  This smells like cheap cologne from a dime store!  The first hit is strong and sweet but it does eventually fade.  However, the top notes are not light and reminisicent of a rose garden, but more of a jasmine mixed scent that is sickly sweet.  Next purchase will be for AERIN Rose De Grasse full-size after receiving my sample (this is a truly elegant and subtle fragrance).  ROSIE by Rosie Jane is for kids and teens only!

reviews.review_title: Amazing scent, inconsistent product. I’m torn.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m genuinely torn on rating this product. On one hand, Rosie is the most incredible scent I’ve found to date. On the other is the fact that this is the most inconsistent perfume I’ve ever (repeatedly) purchased. I discovered this scent when I ordered a trial size roller set with five scents— all great but Rosie was my favorite and I fell in love. It lasted all day without being overpowering, it was a light oil based feel without being greasy or heavy, and it was one of those scents you put on and feel good. I was sold so I ordered the full size roller, excited to get more of this incredible perfume. The full size comes in and it’s completely different from the mini in it’s consistency/scent/wear time/etc— in that it fell grossly short. I was furiously shaking the bottle before applying it to see if mixing it helped and applying way more than I had or should, to no avail. So I figured I just got a bad batch and ordered the largest spray size thinking it’ll be good, no worries. The scent was better but it lasted maybe 30 minutes (if that) in terms of wear time and once again I was using more to compensate. I’m now bummed because again, I love this scent so I think back to the first trial size set I ordered, hoping to find the small roller I got which knocked my socks off. I could only find a spray trial size (but thought little of it) only to find that, you guessed it, I was wrong yet again. Other than the full size roller, which seemed full on defective, I wouldn’t say the products were bad… just wildly inconsistent in a way that makes me wish I hadn’t spent a couple hundred dollars buying what *should be the same product* and chasing after what I still believe to be the perfect scent for me. I understand that a natural perfume might have some variations from batch to batch but this is way beyond the realm of reasonable considering the cost. It’s a shame because honestly, it smells so darn good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Three stars only because the roller ball had practically no scent compared to the perfume sample version of the same fragrance. I used it up in about 2 weeks. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent smells a bit different from the sample size. However, i love this scent! Lasts all day and doesn’t give me a headache like other perfumes do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail perfume. I love it so much, smells so clean and nice. And it last long (at least with my body chemistry) perfume dont usually last on me even the highest oil concentrate one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously just water spray for71 it’s raise water spray. I think it’s very bad batch I agree sample were fantastic, not actual size please check sephora the batches t q . I totally agree with a viewer it’s going back to the store . The skylar perfume was way better sadly nothing available Wright now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great fragrance but they have changed the formula which ruined everything. The smell of this perfume  is to die-for, however it does not last very long. I really wish that they make this perfume more strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite of the By Rosie Jane scents. I've received so many compliments on this perfume. Love the light, musk notes. Subtle and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start off by saying I absolutely LOVE Rosie By Rosie Jane and have bought multiple travel size of this perfume. Today I received my first full size bottle and…nothing, no fragrance at all! I sprayed it on my arm 5 times and still nothing. :( I’m not sure what’s wrong with their more recent batches but I’m hoping they fix the formula because I miss it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! From other reviews, I am scared that if I buy the full-size version it might smell different, but the one I have is perfect for me! It’s a really light scent that I feel comfortable wearing either to work or going out at night. And I don’t think the scent fades quickly, but it does develop and change on the skin, smelling kind of like sunscreen at first and then more rosy the longer it’s worn.

reviews.review_title: Not the same scent as what I have in full size.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Confused? I have a full bottle of Rosie and this travel size smells nothing like it. I think they bottled a different scent of another Rosie Jane perfumes in this bottle. I bought my other full size bottle from the Rosie Jane website. I don’t know if I will purchase this perfume from Sephora again bc something is definitely not right here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the initial smell of these fragrances and love that they're made from clean ingredients, but they have no lasting smell! I bought this and had to use 1/4 of bottle just to get some scent. Not a fan as I first was. Gonna save my $$ for something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 7 day detox box and oh my gosh does Rosie smell so good with my body chemistry. It’s soft and romantic and such a different rose than most perfumes. I love Rosie the best then Leila Lou then Lake. By Rosie Jane makes awesome scents that don’t hurt my head.

reviews.review_title: Could it be? Is the original scent back?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Last year, I fell madly in love with the Rosie scent after buying the sample pack from their website. I later splurged on a full-sized oil here from Sephora and was absolutely crushed to discover they had changed the formula and the smell couldn’t even begin to compare. Not to be melodramatic, but it completely ruined my entire day. I couldn’t stop thinking about this ethereal perfume for months. I kept my tiny little sample and would very occasionally dab a little drop on my arm and smell it with delight and melancholy. I bought a few bottles from ebay, hoping they were somebody’s “old stock” bottles, but was disappointed each time. In a final attempt, I bought this small spray bottle now (wondering if perhaps the spray and oil versions would be different) and was shocked to discover it smells EXACTLY like the scent I fell in love with! I’m hoping against hope that the company brought the old scent back, and that this isn’t just leftover bottles from the old good version. I know this review is exceedingly dramatic but I hope the Rosie Jane team occasionally reads reviews here and knows how beloved the original is. If you have brought it back, thank you so, so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this perfume + line by asking another woman who smelled amazing what she was wearing and I was not disappointed.  I bought this travel spray to make sure it was going to smell just as good on my unique body chemistry and it does.  I love that it's natural and toxin free and lightly scented.  I highly recommend this specific scent and I also cannot wait to try the others.  Hooray for clean beauty/perfumes!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume!!! I have been wearing it for the last few years and everyone asks me what fragrance I’m wearing so they can order it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this perfume after being a devoted user of Glossier You. I was looking for something light, clean, and natural without the signature “pepper” of glossier. Rosie is perfect - warm, clean, with just enough floral to perk it up and a balanced and comforting base to bring it to earth.  I tried the sample set first and knew Rosie was the one.   The reason I didn’t give the 5th star is because I wish the fragrance lasted a little bit longer on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, not too overwhelming + has a nice lasting time. If I've been out for the day, just a quick spritz to touch up is all that's needed.

I really enjoy the By Rosie Jane perfumes for reasons that might be negatives for other people.  Many perfumes give me headaches and these are not overpowering or overwhelming.  I don't like when perfume lingers for many, many hours or into the next day.  I appreciate that these gently fade and don't leave a lingering half scent that you can't wash off.      Fragrance that has that kind of staying power kind of freaks me out.  Rosie is my favorite everyday scent.  It smells clean and warm and gentle to me and not powdery.  I have gone through a travel spray and the oil so far and just purchased my second travel spray.  I got a sample of the Dylan perfume oil recently and just purchased that in the travel spray.  I like how fresh Dylan smells and I definitely smell the cedar notes most.  This fall, I plan to purchase the James perfume, which I currently have in the body oil from their website.  It is a lovely cooler weather scent.

This is my best everyday scent by far! So fresh and light and certainly not overwhelming while pregnant and breastfeeding. This will always be my go to! I love how it is so versatile. I wear it for almost every occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! Actually, I love all of them! They are all so light and wearable, yet they linger all day long. Rosie is one of my favorites because it’s a good everyday scent. It’s light and feminine and I always get a ton of compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how bright and cheerful this scent is! I first loved Leila Lou (it smells like PEARS) but this one is my favorite By Rosie Jane scent.

I love this perfume. I purchased it almost two years ago to wear on my wedding day. Now, I try to save it for special occasions. I'll be sad when this bottle is empty, but would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! It's warm and sweet without being overpowering. It stays on my skin all day. Super versatile - great for all occasions and any time of year. Definitely recommend picking this one up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how this smells! To me it smells, light, feminine, a little sexy and its perfect for the office, a date, and anywhere really!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own four scents from the brand (Leila Lou, Rosie, Madie and Angie) and while they are all fantastic, Rosie is by far my favorite! It smells incredible, fresh and not overpowering. I always receive compliments with Rosie. It also layers well with the other scents, they all perfectly complement one another.  I tend to get headaches easily from perfumes, but I have no problems with this one. I layer it with the body oil and the scent carries throughout the day. Even my four-year-old son loves it! You can NOT go wrong with this scent. Don’t hesitate, you’ll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance and I get compliments every time I wear it. It’s subtle enough for every day but also can be dressed up. I also love that it’s TSA approved and I can take her anywhere with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite perfume ever! I adore it. Use it daily. I recommend the oil for portable and lasting scent. This is my go to. I love it and everyone else seems to as well.

Fresh, light scent perfect for the summer heat! Easily one of my faves, the perfect choice for when you don't want to spend time thinking about which perfume to wear on a particular day. Only wish the sillage was stronger and lasted longer on the skin. Otherwise beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a very light, sophisticated scent. I always get compliments when I wear it! I will definitely be repurchasing once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of my favorite summer fragrances! Light,  clean and smells amazing....the body oil is fantastic too. Give it a try you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite brand of perfume. Subtle and not overpowering. Sexy scent. Light and airy. Amazing perfume.
This is my favorite perfume of all time. The Rosie scent is perfect and my favorite of all the By Rosie Jane perfumes - all of them smell great but Rosie is so great and perfect for every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite scent! Not overpowering, as close as you can get to natural and non-toxic ingredients at an affordable price too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of Rosie Jane scents. They are clean, fresh, and unique. Rosie is my fav one. I love a good musky nude scent and Rosie is one of the best. Subtle and very complimentary. Not at all overpowering, but it still lasts for most of the day.
Beautiful perfume. Not over powering. Lovely smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume!! It has such a nice clean scent & it is my go to everyday scent!!

This is one of my go-to scents (the other is Lake). It’s delicate, smells amazing and is perfect for everyday wear. I can’t recommend this enough. Although, wish the scent was a tadddd bit stronger. I reapply like it’s my job :)

I have yet to find a By Rosie Jane scent I DON’T like, but this one is my current favorite.  It’s not your typical flowery rose scent, it’s more of an aldehyde with floral notes.  It’s subtle but still noticeable up close.  It’s a great everyday scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite jeans & t-shirt scent! And the fact that it's clean makes it even more rockstar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent and get so many compliments when I wear it. It is a subtle, fresh scent that is not overpowering and smells clean and fresh. I am not a fan of heavy scents so this is perfect for me. I like to layer it with the body oil to intensify the scent and make it last longer if I will be doing more intense or outdoor activities.

I haven't worn perfume in a long time since finding out that many have some not-so-great ingredients. I recently tried By Rosie Jane perfumes, and I love that their products are clean. Rosie is subtle enough to wear for any and all occasions, and is my go-to daily scent. It smells so good, and gives me a little confidence boost every time I put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I even begin...? So, my friend was wearing her, and I asked who she was and she said her name was, “Rosie”. I fell in love at first sniff. Immediately bought her & love to wear her. She’s CLEAN & super easy to travel with. So happy I found, Rosie. She has an almost amber scent & I like to pair her with the oil for longer lasting wear.

reviews.review_title: Some of my ALL-TIME favorite fragrances
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: By Rosie Jane makes some of my most beloved fragrances, ever, hands down! I LOVE “Rosie” and “James” they are gorgeous scents that are not overbearing- and are quite androgynous. They are seriously soooooo addicting!! Highly recommend- plus they are environmentally and health conscious- and are “clean”. GO FOR IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s hard to find clean perfume that 1) lasts and 2) is in a spray form. This is absolutely delicious. It smells like you… but better. I get compliments alll the time, the staying power is REAL. But not like “oh that’s a nice perfume” it’s more like “oh YOU smell good.”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this fragrance for an everyday signature scent. I am not a fan of overpowering smells and this is so fresh and light. It is described as wearing nothing but your birthday suit and that's what is smells like-- just intoxicating. I ended up buying the body oil as well. Also a bonus that it's a clean product too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down one of the best aromas I’ve ever smelled. If I could bathe in it, I would.

reviews.review_title: Me (and my BF) LOVE this scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I wore this scent, my boyfriend stopped in his tracks! Love the scent, it's pure and gentle but softly sexy. I usually have issues with perfume giving me headaches but this brand doesn't do that so it's an A+ for me! It does wear off quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is my favorite of all time! I get sooo many compliments when I wear it, and the fact to that it’s clean makes it just perfect. I do wish it were stronger and lasted a bit longer, but I love it enough to just keep reapplying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite fragrance! I love it so much I wear every day. It has the perfect amount of rose and musk. I can definitely say this is my signature scent. I also love to pair it with my Rosie body oil. This fragrance is long lasting and definitely worth every penny!

reviews.review_title: Rosie- so fresh, so clean, so good!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using Rosie for about a year. My favorite! Such a fresh scent. I have sensitivities to strong fragrances, this is light and fresh. You may need to apply an extra dose through out the day, but worth it for people who prefer clean products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super clean product and smells amazing. Only reason it’s not 5 stars is because it doesn’t last long (I’m assuming because I’d need to use the body oil with it to enhance the smell), but still worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so fresh!!  I love the scent! I love layering the body oil with the perfume.  It smells so pretty and fresh.  I wish it lasted a little longer, but I love the fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: About a year ago I was on the hunt for my new signature scent. I absolutely fell in love with almost ALL of the scents from Rosie Jane, it was hard for me to lick from the sampler! I ended up choosing Rosie which was shocking to me because I typically don’t love the fake scent of rose that many perfumes have. This is a game changer in “rose” scented perfumes. Also the company in general is a game changer is how clean and sustainable they are. 5 stars all around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this fragrance! it’s such a soft, natural scent. it’s not overwhelming but definitely is a statement scent. it’s sexy and elegant. will purchase again!
This smells amazing, and it lasts a long time. If I put it on in the morning I still smell it at the end of the day, it smells warm and lightly sweet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Rosie perfume has the BEST clean scent! I look forward to putting it on every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so fresh and clean smelling! And the fact that everything is gluten free means that I can wear it all without having an allergic reaction. This is the only brand of perfume that will ever trust or wear. It’s perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this scent! I could wear it everyday. Easy to transport-put it in your pocket, purse, or toiletry bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my fav perfumes and I own a lot!! I have replenished this bottle (no joke) 5x! It smells wonderful and people always ask what I’m wearing!! I love this scent soooo much!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is fresh and lovely. I ordered the sample set and fell in love with this one right away. It's very clean and pleasant.

reviews.review_title: Love this scent by Rosie Jane
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rosie Jane has the best scents, they are so light and fresh and great for layering. I love this scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CLEAN fragrance brand - both the oils and the spray fragrance are absolutely fantastic.  Because there are unisex fragrances, my husband can use some of them, too.  Win/Win

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands-down my favorite perfume. I love that it's light and almost acts as a me but better scent. Being a clean fragrance is important to me, and this is easily the best I've tried. If you want a stronger version, I highly recommend the Rosie perfume oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume- I had never received so many compliments on my fragrance as I do when I wear this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has become one of my go-to scents for daytime wear. It’s sweet but also subtly sexy because of the musk. It combines some of my favorite scents with the rose and musk. I’m so glad I discovered this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite perfume! It’s a subtle floral scent, but not too overpowering. I love that it’s a safer fragrance as well, I feel better about using it knowing what ingredients are in it. Have purchased this a few times and will continue to’

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found out about this company through instagram and I’m hooked. I’m also literally obsessed with this fragrance! It’s in the running for a life long fragrance of mine. It’s super gentle too; I accidentally sprayed myself in the eye with it this morning and it didn’t really even irritate my eye lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this scent in the Discovery Set and had to order in the full size. It’s the perfect combination of sweet and musk that smells like summer!
This is by far my favorite perfume, light, clean and natural. Always get complements and love that it is natural and what the company stands for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this scent.  It was my first from BRJ and I have them all now.  I love the subtle scent that isn't overwhelming, but just enough rose.  I get many compliments and have even gifted this scent to my sister, who is now a huge fan!  I wore it on a first date and after that it became my signature because of the reaction I got.  Please don't change this fragrance, I'm in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely, clean, light fragrance - good to layer with the perfume oil. Hoping for body lotion in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Rosie Jane perfumes bc they are clean and unique. They are great value bc the scent lasts for most of the day. My favs are Leila Lou and Rosie. I'm a big big fan of musky nude scents and this rosie is one of the best. Dare I say it's my signature?
I love how clean and crisp this fragrance smells and that it’s free of harmful parabens and chemicals! I get compliments on it all the time and highly recommend to any family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite scent by by/r j.  It is soft, floral, warm and cozy but still wearable all year round. To me it is reminiscent of Loves Baby Soft, but in the best possible sophisticated way!  I will never be without it!
I purchased this perfume in Cali 5 years ago and have not stopped wearing it since! I get compliments weekly on my perfume. Love my Rosie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite fragrance ever! I get compliments every time I wear it. I layer it with the Rosie body oil to keep the fragrance on longer. OBSESSED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful feminine fragrance - the prettiest rose scent - does not smell like a grandma!  Wears down beautifully

I first tried Rosie while looking for a cleaner alternative while being pregnant. It smells so beautiful like roses with warm and clean notes. I’ve also tried the other scents in the Rosie Jane line. You can’t go wrong with any of the scents- they’re all beautiful and different. But Rosie is my personal fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. I began my love for by Rosie Jane with their sample collection. Then I bought Leila Lou, Lake, and then Rosie. These scents are wonderful, not over powering and make you smile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So clean smelling. Can be subtle but still get tons of compliments. Have purchased many times. Floral but not super floral. Clean, subtle musk. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Rosie scent! It took me months of searching for a perfume that was floral but not overwhelming. This scent perfectly balances the rose scent with musk to create a warm scent that always makes my day when I wear it.

reviews.review_title: Girly, Sexy, Sweet, Confident all in One!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so light and fresh, with just enough warmth.  I love it.  Very sexy and sweet at the same time.  Not overpowering.  It is enough to make someone notice...and ask.  It girly and powerful...when I wear it it makes me feel sexy, confident and I love it when I am close with someone and they compliment me on how great my skin smells....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am super sensitive to smell and I don't want anything too sweet, too strong, etc. This is a very nice, clean scent.
My favorite fragrance - great for everyday wear and I always get compliments! The clean ingredients are an added bonus!
I love this product! I get so many compliments on the scent. I’m continually impressed by the quality of Rosie Jane’s perfumes. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Excellent Choice for a Clean Perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Often choosing a clean fragrance feels like a sacrifice. However, this fragrance is on par with many of my old (less clean) favorites both in quality of scent and staying power. It has quickly become an essential for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rosie by Rosie Jane is the best smelling perfume I’ve used. I use the body oil in this scent after the shower, and I use the roller ball and perfume on top to keep the scent lasting longer. I get compliments all the time—even my girlfriends always comment on how fresh I always smell (that sounded weirder after I typed it out). This scent by Rosie Jane will be stocked in my house/purse/car indefinitely!
I tried a sample set and found a winner in Rosie. It is subtle and lovely. I’m not usually a fan of rose so I was surprised that I loved it. The musk makes it a beautiful scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, it's so warm and feminine! I also love that I can wear this perfume both day and night, the fragrance is so versatile. As an added bonus, I appreciate that it's clean and made from essential oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. It’s so light and versatile. I get complements every time I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite Rosie Jane scent! Love the light fragrance this provides!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fresh clean scent! I’m on my second bottle and have never purchased a perfume twice before. It’s my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite fragrance. Perfect balance of warm and clean. I am sensitive to very strong fragrances so Rosie is perfect for me. I like to use the perfume Spray and the perfume oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite and now with the body oil it's amazing its such smooth sexy smell this is my go to after shower and sleep in bed feeling sensual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore this fragrance! I'm not usually one to wear perfumes but I decided I wanted something a little more grown up than body spray but not as harsh as some of the other scents out there. I originally tried out the sample pack and fell in love with all the fragrances but this one and lake are my all time favorites. They work perfectly for me because I'm sensitive to strong scents but this is very soft and sensual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: while I like most scents by Rosie Jane, this one is my favorite. Light and fresh. Very subtle, I like that it does not enter the room first overpowering, one has to come closes to smell it. Perfect for everyday wear. Some say it doesn't last long, my experience is different. While I might not smell it after a few hours everybody else does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has me getting compliments everywhere. The smell is so clean and well balanced. My only quarrel is that after a while to the wearer, the smell seems to wear off, which leads you to use more and your bottle empties quickly. Even so, people still ask me what I'm wearing. I spray in my hair for longer lasting results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this fragrance!! The rose/musk scent is so subtle yet beautiful.  It’s not in your face- just smells like your skin. I can get a small whiff of it hours after application.  I love to wear it to bed also. I was looking for a rose scent forever- this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sent from by Rosie. I've purchased it at least 4 times in the past year. The sent is so subtle but makes a lasting impression. It lingers on for hours and can't get enough. I can spray it directly on my skin and have no reaction like other perfumes. I've purchased almost every other scent in their collection. Highly recommend if you like rose and sandalwood scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much! This is the only perfume I have ever repurchased. The only downside is I wish it lasted longer! I get so many compliments when I wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want the old scent back. Was my favorite then they changed it. Now it just smells like a bar of soap and fades quickly to nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, I really did; while the initial burst of scent is fantastic, the scent has zero staying power. Sprayed several times on the insides of my wrists, but the scent was gone after a few minutes. Used too much to send back, but won’t be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get NOTHING from this perfume. There is a difference between a subtle second skin scent, and a perfume that just doesn’t smell like anything. I get absolutely nothing after about 5 minutes, don’t waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What happened to this scent? After buying the rollerball version maybe 3x, twice from the manufacturer and once when it came to Sephora, the fourth one (in the new, taller/slimmer packaging) smells totally different. All musk, no roses. I used to get so many compliments on this perfume. Very disappointed in the formula change. I should have heeded the reviews.

I used to love this perfume so much. The scent was fragrant with the musk and the sweet rose and vanilla undertones. I used to get compliments for it all of the time. However, they have changed their formula and now the scent is barely noticeable. It’s not as fragrant and the scent does not last.  I’m really disappointed as it used to be my go-to perfume. Now I need to find something else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All of the Rosie Jane fragrances smell like cheap drugstore cologne. Yuck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft and subtle, like clean skin. My everyday fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really am mystified by how many people dislike this scent? It's very softly floral/musky. Somewhat similar to Glossier You or Juliet Has a Gun Not a Perfume. This scent lasts surprisingly long and just smells clean.  It's a scent for people who don't like scent. I managed to get mine via a subscription box for $12 USD full sized, but I do not think for me it would be worth $71 CAD. For the price I paid, 4 stars. If I paid more, like 3 maybe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It seems like the formula changed. I loved this scent the first time I bought it a year or so ago. I even bought the travel size and the roller oil.  Then recently I bought the full size and it smells nothing like it used to. This new bottle doesn’t really have a scent...did they change the formula or did I get a bottle that was defective??? What a waste...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent and it's one I keep returning to even though I have a dresser top full of colognes and perfumes. Originally, I purchased the sample set and Rosie ended up being my favorite. Since then I've gotten the oil as well as the spray. I get more of a musk scent with floral undertones but whatever it is, it's lovely. Both the spray and oil last all day on me. If the company decides to branch out and offer bath gels and lotions I would definitely purchase them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would call this fragrance a floral scent. It's almost more like a bitter type of floral though. When you first roll it on however it does kind of smell like vodka. After that starts to go away though it falls into a category I like to just call pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing really special about this stood out too me. Smelt good at first but nothin “wow” worthy. Then literally 10 mins later I couldn’t even smell where I directly sprayed it into my wrist.. disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy for me and I have been very happy with it. This perfume doesn’t give me headaches like other perfumes do and it smells so lovely. It’s mostly a rose scent with just a slight creamy (vanilla?) note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a huge disappointment, I had a sample that I loved so decided to buy the travel spray.. the spray was broken, and the scent was zero, pure alcohol.. This one should be discontinued unless they can make it smell like perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a while ago because I fell in love with the original formula. I do agree that the scent wears off very quickly but I loved the smell of roses so much that I put up with it. But after repurchasing this again, the scent completely changed. Doesn’t even smell like rose anymore. I also bought the travel size and tested that too and smells just like this one. I don’t know what happened but I’m so unhappy with this formula change!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got these in the discovery set and have been trying them out each day to see which ones I love. And wow! This one is such a beautiful scent. I have scent allergies and can’t handle strong scents and it’s near impossible to find a fragrance I love that doesn’t overwhelm me. I tried this one today and it’s light and cozy. Beautiful for anytime really. The musk and rose work together perfectly to give it that musk skin scent while still keeping it youthful. It also doesn’t have that powdery smell that is common when musk and florals are combined. This one is my favorite so far.

reviews.review_title: fun, light and smells like sunshine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this perfume and it has become my go to!! I use it everyday - it smells so amazing. It’s super light and everyone compliments me on it - I’m buying another bottle because I know I’ll use it so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The sent is absolutely incredible, only issue is, I f you get carried away with spritzing you will run out in one evening like I did.

reviews.review_title: Buy the smaller version if you prefer floral scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like so many of the other reviews, I have to agree that it is strangely a totally different smell from the mini-travel size and the roller. The first time I bought this size, it smelled like the smaller version, but the second time, it had a very alcoholesque smell to it, not flowery like the travel size (the smell I actually want!) Seems like at rip off to have to buy the small one constantly to get the smell I want. Is the oil different too?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this smell, very soft & not too floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with previous reviewers, that the rollerball version has a stronger rose scent. However, I was looking for a soft, clean scent that is inoffensive and would not aggravate anyone’s allergies. The full-sized perfume (less flowery) is the perfect office scent, and checks all my boxes. I ended up returning the rollerball, but kept the full-size. I would repurchase the full-size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance dislike the spray!  I have this fragrance in the oil formulation and it is SO much better.  The spray doesn’t smell the same.  It has an alcohol smell.  The oil smells fantastic and stays on longer.  Going back to the oil roller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I loved the rollerball sample I got a couple years ago. The sample was a soft floral, heavy on rose. The full size is a completely different scent. It's a very strong scent that I find extremely bitter and powdery. Unlike other reviewers who have trouble with this fragrance lasting, it lasts perfectly fine on me for hours and hours and hours. Which is unfortunate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving it 3 stars because I found if you layer it with the oil too, you can actually smell it. I literally sprayed it like 6 times when I first got it and there was NO smell. I kept spraying it, thinking it would help but it didn’t. I loved the light, clean scent from the oil version of this I received as a sample, so I figured the perfume would smell a little stronger than the oil. I was wrong, there is barely any smell. I want to return it but it will take forever due to the shipping regulations because it’s perfume, and by the time I receive reimbursement, it will be at least 3 weeks! Makes it seem like more of a headache. Will probably keep and use in combination with oil, but will not be purchasing again. Stick with the oil, and even then, it fades too quickly. Wish the smell lasted longer or it was stronger because this would be an everyday perfume for me! Good for after showering perfume, because you can smell it before you fall asleep lol!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just purchased this, and it literally has no smell. It's like spraying nothing but water and alcohol onto your skin and clothing, very disappointed.  If I had a sephora closer than an hour away from me I would be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I got a sample from the bottle at the store it smelled so nice - a little floral, not too sweet, and very delicate. I ordered the mini size and it smells totally different - like baby powder/an old musty closet. Not happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. Its just perfect for everyday—when i want a little something that's really just for me. Also I LOVE that its non-toxic   clean!!! Thank you Sephora for supporting clean brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the other Rosie Jane scents but this one is just plain bad. The smell is so barley there you seriously can’t smell even a whiff of it after 5 minutes. I have put it on and asked many people can they smell it and they all say no. The little bit of smell you first get smells blah. It really isn’t worth the purchase. Try her other scents as they are amazing but if you are looking for something in the same category as Rosie check into Replicas Lazy Sunday Morning fragrance. Its in the same type of scent category but smells way better and you can actually smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Leila Lu and was looking for another fragrance to  mix it with to give the fragrance an extra kick. I tried Rosie on impulse and wow it was a mistake. If someone was pranking me by mixing alcohol and water then this is what I’d end up with. Literally no fragrance whatsoever. The others I’ve tried  like Angie, and Janes are both fresh and beautiful, with Leila Lu being my favorite due to the fresh pear opening. None of them last long due to their composition but that’s ok. I just can’t understand how Rosie is so far off the mark?

reviews.review_title: its everything i was looking for in a perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rosie is my absolute favorite perfume its everything i was looking for in a perfume it such a treat Very soft feminine flirty sweet Spring in A jar ..the perfect rose scent ..And the staying power is great for me unlike what everyone has said.. it doesnt go away tell i wash my clothes a little goes a very long ways and my boyfriend loves it he always tells me how much he loves that he can smell me on him after im gone... I got a free sample pack of all there scents a few years ago and have been in love ever sense... Leila Lou is my second favorite sometimes I where them together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite scent.  I tried the discovery scent box and now got Rosie in full size since it was my favorite out of all of them (though I liked all of them, you can't go wrong with their other fragrances!)  This is just so inviting as a scent, and it does linger all day on your clothes or close to your skin.  So I think what all of these people who are saying it doesn't last are talking about is sillage; it is not like fragrances that have a high sillage in the cloud that causes your coworkers to sneeze or cough after you waft by.  It sits close to the skin and can be smelled by yourself and someone sitting close to you, not the whole room which I greatly prefer. It definitely will still be on your wrist at the end of the day. I have a sensitive nose and am allergic to everything under the sun so these clean perfumes work much better for me, no headaches or sneezing.  I like a little warmth and depth to floral scents to off set the sweet or grandma type of smell, so the white musk is a great addition to the rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells very nice and fresh, but also fade out so fast like 3 minutes. I asked my husband how do you like the new perfume? He said he can’t tell if I wear perfume or not. I liked the scent but It didn’t work as perfume, so I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Rosie Jane Discovery Set and this is my new favourite perfume (I also liked James and Leila Lou)! I want this in a shampoo, lotion, laundry detergent, everything! It's light and inoffensive. I don't smell rose at all, but it's slightly floral and fresh. The only bummer is it doesn't last nearly long enough (2 hours tops) and initially smells a lot like alcohol (which is VERY strange for an Eau de Parfum). However, as soon as it dries down it's outright heavenly! My other favorites include Burberry Brit Sheer and Pacifica Power House. I would love this in a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very beautiful, soft scent—more clean smelling than floral. However, it has absolutely no staying power. It maybe lasts 15-30 minutes on my skin? I'll use up the tiny rollerball I have of this, but I definitely won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t get enough of scents by Rosie Jane, this one smells so good if you like musk scents; BUT, the only way to get even a hint of the incredible smell is to pretty much bath in it (gross) or just put a dab under your nose (weird).... it does smell that good though. There is a strong alcohol scent before it dries down and I think this brand hand mixes so maybe this is a bad batch or someone messed up on the amounts. I’m curious if the oil may be better, but I’m not interested in such a small bottle. I hope they will reformulate this, it really is a lovely scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume lifts my spirits every time I spray it. I've been searching a very long time for a sheer, clean, quiet rose scent that suits my body chemistry. Found it! Recently bought a full bottle but learned it was the original formulation with more musk, which did not work for me. Distraught, I contacted By Rosie Jane and learned their latest formulation is the one that I love. I simply exchanged the bottle for the new one and I couldn't be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this larger size because I have the smaller travel size and just loved the smell. However, upon spraying the larger size, there was practically no scent. I even tested the larger and smaller one to compare. So I then purchased another smaller size since my other smaller size was almost gone. again no scent. I don't know if the company has changed the composition but the current bottle contents have little smell and do not smell at all like the smaller size I purchased while ago. I will be returning both recent purchases. so disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the type of fragrance I have been on the hunt for for months! It has has a very subtle light scent, which is exactly why I love it. Its a great daytime fragrance so if your looking for a very bold fragrance for a night on the town then this isn’t for you. I even use this on days when I decide to stay in. I’m not exactly sure if it’s staying power and that’s why I knocked off one star but would have actually ranked this 4 1/2 stars if I could. Overall, I love it and would buy again.

reviews.review_text: Smells very light almost reminds of Glow by J.Lo that I used to have in high school.

reviews.review_title: lovely scent but too much alcohol at 1st spritz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent BUT... I’m very disappointed in the staying power. It lingers in my hair at the back of my neck and seems to stick a little more if I put oil on my skin but it has a high alcohol smell when first sprayed which is why I think it does not last as much. For an “eau de parfum” that is unusual to smell alcohol in first spritz. I’m hoping my bottle was old and when I purchase the next it will be better because like I said, I love the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the beautiful fresh and feminine scent but it has absolutely no staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume feeling so excited to try it because I’ve been really into “clean” products and since experiencing a nasal allergy I’d decided to give this perfume a try. I personally love the smell of roses and vanilla so this sounded perfect to me. The bottle and packaging are recycable and very cute. But I was so shocked when I smelled it first the first time and I wore to work every single day since I bought it. I realized it barely smelled even when I sprayed a couple extra pssttts I literally couldn’t smell anything. The smell is so faint that it’s actually barely there and the worst part is that the scent disappears within about just 2 hours. But the perfume itself did not irritate my sensitive skin. It was actually very gentle and did not dry my skin out. I might try her other products tho in the future but at this time not really liking this perfume.

reviews.review_text: Addictive, feminine, intoxicating. This is my absolute favorite perfume. Its light, powdery and floral, with some sweetness.
